Name: M 79 - Muriel Goode-Trufant, Corporation Counsel.
Title: RESOLUTION APPROVING THE APPOINTMENT BY THE MAYOR OF MURIEL GOODE-TRUFANT FOR THE POSITION OF CORPORATION COUNSEL.
BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee
History.BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

Text:
RESOLVED, Pursuant to Sections 31 and 391 of the New York City Charter, the Council hereby approves the appointment by the Mayor of Muriel Goode-Trufant for the position of Corporation Counsel.

COUPLED ON GO
